issues: Minor typo in env_local_scale term name: 'gramanoid' should be 'graminoid'
Missing ecosystem and ecosystem_category fields that are present in some other study samples

Elevation difference of 4m between asserted and geospatial lookup (minor discrepancy)

Consider adding ecosystem ('Environmental') and ecosystem_category ('Terrestrial') fields for consistency with other study samples
Enhance geo_loc_name specificity following format 'country: state, specific location' more precisely
Consider using geospatially-derived elevation (1656m) if more accurate than asserted value (1652m)
Add more specific soil classification terms based on the kastanozem/phaeozem inferred soil types
Consider adding land cover classification terms from the rich inferred grassland data
